content: Gloria al Padre, al Figlio e allo Spirito Santo. Com'era nel principio, ora e sempre, nei secoli dei secoli. Amen.
translations: eng:Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Spirit. As it was in the beginning, is now and ever shall be, worl
